text: With this brief introduction , we hope that we have conveyed the general applicability of the principle of maximum entropy .In particular , in combination with Bayesian inference , it is a powerful tool for consistent reasoning in the light of new data .

With this brief introduction , we hope that we have conveyed the general applicability of the principle of maximum entropy .In particular , in combination with Bayesian inference , it is a powerful tool for consistent reasoning in the light of new data .

The number of maximum entropy applications in our field has grown steadily in recent years , in areas as diverse as sequence analysis , structural modelling , and neurobiology .In this Perspectives article , we give a broad introduction to the method , in an attempt to encourage its further adoption .
